document_data.name: Sha'Quessir Mirabella
document_data.mainbody: '''Sha'Quessir Mirabella''' was rumored to be a [[human]] [[warrior]] offered acceptance into the [[elven knight]]s of [[Myth Drannor]].
document_data.Possessions: If the rumors were true, Mirabella would have worn [[elven plate]], fought with a [[longsword]], and rode a [[moon-horse]] like all other knights.
document_data.History: Centuries ago, Sha'Quessir was a human knight at [[Myth Drannor]] in the [[Elven Court]].
document_data.Rumors and Legends: [[Gold elf|Gold elves]] of Evermeet disputed this claim since all elven knights were pure-breed [[elf|elves]].
